author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

According to Jennifer Siebel Newsom — California’s so-called “First Partner”- we are a country of immigrants.” But that won’t stop the Trump administration from “targeting and hunting” families who have broken federal immigration laws. But what she conveniently leaves out is that “immigrant” and “illegal immigrant” are two completely different things — but that’s neither here nor there.

So, while Jennifer isn’t usually in the news much like her husband, when the First Partner sheds crocodile tears to gaslight naive voters and slanders those who want to uphold federal immigration laws,
title: California’s “First Partner” (aka Gov. Newsom's wife) cries crocodile tears over immigrants, but just the illegal ones

While the cost of illegal immigration continues to hit the American taxpayer harder than our laws probably allow, it’s the behavior of the people defending this insanity that makes it all even more expensive.

title: The cost of the anti-ICE LA Riots is out, and it's in the tens of millions so far

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

While Pride Month has been relatively quiet for most of us — at least compared to the last four years — the same can't be said for NBC’s News Center Maine.

NBC’s News Center Maine did what most insane people would do — they hired a drag queen to deliver the weather to viewers.

NBC's @newscentermaine hosted a drag queen to report on the weather for Maine...

No, this isn't a joke. This is real. pic.twitter.com/hGVrloBVhq
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok)
title: NBC News hands its weather report off to a drag queen

title: Investigation reveals popular AI app will help minors access "gender-affirming care" AGAINST parental wishes

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

After the U.S. launched targeted strikes on Iranian nuclear sites over the weekend, President Donald Trump said on Sunday that a regime change in Iran may be on the table if its leaders fail to "MAKE IRAN GREAT AGAIN." Some conservatives have voiced support for the statement. Is a regime change war next? Today’s show breaks it all down.
title: Watch: Is a Regime Change War Next After America Bombed Iran? Crowder Gives You The Facts

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

In the progressive pursuit of being incredibly inclusive, our northern Neighbors are out there renaming streets to languages that the majority of residents don’t speak.

Last week, the city renamed “Trutch Street” to “Šxʷməθkʷəy̓əmsəm Street.” And no, I don’t know how to pronounce that, nor do I understand how they got that spelling, nor do I get how “linguistics” came up with it. Still, this had to be done, as it was the only inclusive thing to do, even if it excludes the majority of people. And no, I don’t think city officials in Vancouver had anything better to do.

BREAKING: Vancouver just
title: Canada reveals new woke sign that, in the name of inclusion... you can't read

author: Brodigan
description:
Well, there you have it. Over the weekend, a group of Freedom Doritos took out Iran’s nuclear program. It’s almost like President Donald Trump has been saying Iran can’t have a nuclear weapon for over a decade. Well. FAFO. Let’s get into it. Oh, and the New York Times sucks.

AMERICA BOMBED IRAN: WHAT’S NEXT?

  • President Trump addresses the nation after U.S. bombs 3 Iranian nuclear sites
  • Pentago
title: 🔴 Watch! America Bombed Iran... Is a Regime Change War Next ?

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Over the weekend, Donald Trump fulfilled another campaign promise and took out Iran's nuclear weapon capabilities. Planes were flown. Bombs we dropped. So much winning was had. At least for now. There is a lot to unpack as the day unfolds, so for now let's focus on silliness. De facto leader of the Democrat Party, Jasmine Crockett, is getting big mad that Donald Trump didn't call her first to let her know what his plans were.

Jasmine did a twenty-minute stream on the TikTok that was a lot of "rackle rackle rackle" every Democrat says. This was the bit that went viral.

JUST IN: Rep. Jasmine Crock
title: Jasmine Crockett is in her feelings because Donald Trump didn't "holla" at her before bombing Iran
